content: अवक्षिप् {c6c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To fling away, to throw or cast off; सूक्ष्मवस्त्रमवक्षिप्य मुनिवस्त्राण्यवस्त ह <ls>Rām.</ls>; to hurl. {@--2@} To cause to fly down or away. {@--3@} To reprimand, revile any one, censure, slander; मदलेखामवक्षिप्य <ls>K. 317</ls>; अवाक्षिपद्वासुदेवं <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--4@} To grant, yield. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To cause to fall down.
